Its a good game, especially if you like to sweat and be competitive. However there are a large number of cheaters recently it seems. You'll find smurfs in low ranked games, so you'll have to work harder to reach high level ranks where there are more honest players. You may not experience this as much as I have or maybe you will but its something to look out for. Overall good game though
Solid 8/10. Everything about this game is great, the only thing i hate is that VAC sucks and there are too many cheaters.
Если вы любите садомазохизм, игра определенно для вас. Обилие школьников и читеров скрашивают эти пасмурные дни.
I only recommend playing prime matchmaking, because since the game is FTP, 8 out of 10 matches at non-prime are filled with cheaters. :)

Decided to play with my mates today, my pc restarted at some point. Not much I could do. After coming back online, I was trying to reconnect multiple times. Restarted steam, verified the integrity of files. I did everything i could to reconnect, but i kept getting "Failed to reconnect" which resulted into 30 mins cooldown. I did my best to reconnect to the game and still got CD. Amazing...
